song: Hold Me, Thrill Me, Kiss Me, Kill Me
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You don't know how you took it
You just know what you got
Oh lawdy, you been stealing from the thieves
And you got caught
In the headlights of a stretch car
You're a star

[Verse 2]
Dressing like your sister
Living like a tart
If they don't know what you're doin'
Babe it must be art
You're a headache, in a suitcase
You're a star

[Chorus 1]
Oh, no, don't be shy
You don't have to go blind
Hold me
Thrill me
Kiss me
Kill me

[Verse 3]
You don't know how you got here
You just know you want out
Believing in yourself almost as much as you doubt
You're a big smash
You wear it like a rash
Star

[Chorus 2]
Oh no, don't be shy
You need a crowd to cry
Hold me
Thrill me
Kiss me
Kill me

[Verse 4]
They want you to be Jesus
They'll got down on one knee
But they'll want their money back
If you're alive at thirty-three
And you're turning tricks
With your crucifix
You're a star, oh child

[Chorus 3]
Of course you're not shy
You don't have to deny love
Hold me
Thrill me
Kiss me
Kill me
